00047 #ifndef EQUAL
00048 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(WIN32CE)
00049 #  define EQUALN(a,b,n)           (strnicmp(a,b,n)==0)
00050 #  define EQUAL(a,b)              (stricmp(a,b)==0)
00051 #else
00052 #  define EQUALN(a,b,n)           (strncasecmp(a,b,n)==0)
00053 #  define EQUAL(a,b)              (strcasecmp(a,b)==0)
00054 #endif
00055 #endif
00056

00111         }

00126 /************************************************************************/
00127 /* ==================================================================== */
00128 /*                             StringList                               */
00129 /* ==================================================================== */
00130 /************************************************************************/
00131 
00132 class StringList
00133 {
00134 private:
00135         vector<string> strings;
00136 
00137 public:
00138         StringList(const string& sstrings, const char delimiter);
00139         StringList(const string& sstrings, const string& delimiters);
00140         StringList(){ }
00141 
00142         int indexof(string qstr);
00143 
00144         void add(string newstr)
00145         {
00146                 strings.push_back(newstr);
00147         }
00148 
00149         void clear()
00150         {
00151                 strings.clear();
00152         }
00153 
00154         int size()
00155         {
00156                 return strings.size();
00157         }
00158 
00159         string& operator [](int index)
00160         {
00161                 return strings[index];
00162         }
00163 
00164         void append(StringList & s);
00165         void append(const string sstrings, const char delimiter);
00166         void append(const string sstrings, const string& delimiters);
00167 
00168         string toString()
00169         {
00170                 string s = "";
00171                 for (int i = 0; i < size(); i++)
00172                         s += strings[i];
00173                 return s;
00174         }
00175 
00176         string toString(const char delimiter)
00177         {
00178                 string s = "";
00179                 for (int i = 0; i < size(); i++)
00180                         s += strings[i] + delimiter;
00181                 return s;
00182         }
00183 
00184         string toString(const string& delimiters)
00185         {
00186                 string s = "";
00187                 for (int i = 0; i < size(); i++)
00188                         s += strings[i] + delimiters;
00189                 return s;
00190         }
00191 };

00193 class S2C
00194 {
00195 
00196 private:
00197         char buf[MAX_LINE_LEN];
00198 
00199 public:
00200         S2C(string s)
00201         {
00202                 s.copy(buf, string::npos);
00203                 buf[s.size()] = 0;
00204         }
00205 
00206         char * c_str()
00207         {
00208                 return buf;
00209         }
00210 
00211 };

00219 class KVP
00220 {
00221 public:
00222         string name, value;
00223 
00224         KVP& operator =(const KVP &id)
00225         {
00226                 name = id.name;
00227                 value = id.value;
00228                 return *this;
00229         }
00230 
00231         KVP& operator =(const KVP *pid)
00232         {
00233                 name = pid->name;
00234                 value = pid->value;
00235                 return *this;
00236         }
00237 
00238         KVP(string n, string v) :
00239                 name(n), value(v)
00240         {
00241         }
00242 
00243         KVP(string namevaluepair);
00244 };

00312 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00313 // Extra Template Functions
00314 //              Exchange()                              --- used to exchange values
00315 //              convertToString()               --- convert value to string
00316 //              convertFromString               --- convert string to values
00317 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00318 template<class T>
00319 static void Exchange(T & a, T & b)
00320 {
00321         T t;
00322         t = a;
00323         a = b;
00324         b = t;
00325 }
00326 
00327 template <class T>
00328 static string convertToString(T &value)
00329 {
00330         stringstream ss;
00331         ss<<value;
00332         string rtnstr = ss.str();
00333         return rtnstr;
00334 }
00335 
00336 template <class T>
00337 static void convertFromString(T &value, const string& s)
00338 {
00339         stringstream ss(s);
00340         ss>>value;
00341 }
